select m.*,b.chinese_name from MAINTENANCE_PLAN m inner join basic_customer_information b on m.customer_id=b.id where 1=1
and m.id=#{maintenanceId}

select b.chinese_name, b.id as customer_id, b.card_id, p.product_name, c.APPLY_QUOTA, c.repay_way, c.repay_status, u.DISPLAY_NAME, b.user_id,c.product_id as productId from customer_application_info c inner join product_attribute p on c.product_id = p.id inner join basic_customer_information b on c.customer_id=b.id inner join sys_user u on b.user_id = u.id --left join MAINTENANCE_PLAN m on m.customer_id = c.customer_id where 1=1
and c.id=#{appId}

select m.* from MAINTENANCE_PLANS_ACTION m where 1=1
and m.maintenance_plan_id=#{id}
select count(*) from MAINTENANCE_PLAN m where m.customer_id=#{id} and (m.end_result=#{endResult} or m.end_result is null)

SELECT count(*) FROM MAINTENANCE_PLAN m where m.customer_manager_id in
#{item.userId}

select mbm.* from manager_belong_map mbm start with child_id = (select amp.id from manager_belong_map t left join account_manager_parameter amp on amp.id = t.child_id left join sys_user su ON su.id = amp.user_id where amp.user_id = #{id} ) connect by prior child_id = parent_id

select b.chinese_name, b.id as customer_id, b.card_id, p.product_name, c.actual_quote, c.repay_way, c.repay_status, m.*, u.DISPLAY_NAME, b.user_id from customer_application_info c inner join product_attribute p on c.product_id = p.id inner join basic_customer_information b on c.customer_id=b.id inner join sys_user u on b.user_id = u.id left join MAINTENANCE_PLAN m on m.customer_id = c.customer_id where 1=1
and m.id=#{id}
